name: CITY OF PHILADELPHIA v. WORKER'S COMPENSATION APPEALS BOARD (BRASTEN). Petition of Anthony BRASTEN
name_abbreviation: City of Philadelphia v. Worker's Compensation Appeals Board
docket_number: Petition No. 629 Middle District Allocatur Docket 1996

parties: CITY OF PHILADELPHIA v. WORKER’S COMPENSATION APPEALS BOARD (BRASTEN). Petition of Anthony BRASTEN.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 16th day of May, 1997, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby GRANTED BUT LIMITED to the following:
Whether the Commonwealth Court erred in finding Petitioner failed to prove abnormal working conditions?
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
693 A.2d 200
CITY OF PHILADELPHIA v. WORKER’S COMPENSATION APPEALS BOARD (BRASTEN). Petition of Anthony BRASTEN.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 16, 1997.
